structure.unit: DIVISION 6. Miami-Dade COUNTY DRYCLEANING AND LAUNDERING ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 8A-124.5. Definitions.
Article shall mean Division 6 of Article III of Chapter 8A of the Code of Miami-Dade County, Florida, and any rules, regulations and standards promulgated pursuant to this article.
Customer shall be a person who inquires about, makes a request for, or purchases cleaning.
Miami-Dade County means Miami-Dade County, Florida.
Cleaner shall mean any person that is in the business of performing cleaning or presents itself to the public as being in the business of performing cleaning.
Cleaning shall mean the cleansing of clothing and other fabrics either with substantially nonaqueous organic solvents, including but not limited to petroleum naptha, or in any other manner.
Director shall mean the County Manager or the County Manager's designee. This definition shall apply to Section 8A-82.1 of the Code of Miami-Dade County, Florida, when utilizing the provisions of this article.
Person shall mean an individual, partnership, joint venture, association, corporation, trust or any other legal entity.
Warranty shall mean an express or implied guarantee provided by a cleaner to a customer with respect to the cleaner's repair, replacement or compensation for defective cleaning.
